record.title: GENERAL LEAVE
record.narrative:
GENERAL LEAVE -- (House of Representatives - December 18, 2007)

[Page: H16802]

speaking.paragraph: Madam Speaker, I ask unanimous consent that all Members have 5 legislative days in which to revise and extend their remarks and include extraneous material on the subject of my upcoming Special Order.

record.chair: Is there objection to the request of the gentlewoman from Indiana?
